title: spacious double room
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Lovely spacious double room 
Mirrored wardrobe , single bed , bedside table, bedside touch lamp ,chest of draws 
Suit a professional 

Share a kitchen,  bathroom & balcony with 1 housemate , you get own fridge 

Free Wifi 

Located 5mins walk to Tooting Bec station , city links within 35mins.
Easy reach to  shops , markets ,restaurants, cafes , gyms 


Reference & 
1 month deposit 

No time wasters
